description:
Break off, fine!: An argument between Chevy, Coron and Panky over some ice cream caused them to break their friendship forever. As for them to not admit they`re sorry, Panky consulted to Kumampa on how they can rebuild their shattered friendship.
Fake Kumampa Appears!: A rumor in the fields states that Kumampa`s around as Chevy and her friends heard about it. But as it turns out to be an impostor named ToTo, a Cappuccino flavored Lion Zooble who wants to meet Kumampa in person. It even gets confusing to the three that ToTo will do anything to meet him.

titles.title: Break off, fine! / Fake Kumampa Appears!
絶交, けっこう! / にせものクマンパ現る!
